issue.title: [CF 817] Sound notification bug
issue.body:
Sorry for bad English :)

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Add combat event "Spell cast success" for instant cast (moonfire,sunfire, etc)
2. Add sound notification "On combat event": Info
3. Spam spell button

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Before 5.3: sound played for each cast. After 5.3: sound play sometimes, sometimes no.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.2.1, 6.2.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no


> Posted by CurseForge user nrw2000 | Imported from CurseForge issue #817 | Raw

comments.body:
Please close ticket. This "bug" related to incorrect timer settings for combat event.


> Posted by CurseForge user nrw2000
